1: · de One en Sabbath sabbaton,  as  Jesus autos was  going diaporeuomai through dia grainfields sporimos,  · kai his autos disciples mathētēs began  to  pick tillō · ho some ho heads stachus of  grain ,  rub psōchō them in  their ho hands cheir,  and kai eat esthiō them.
